content: Gerson Zaverucha's home page Gerson Zaverucha Ph.D., Imperial College, London Associate Professor of Computer Science Federal University of Rio de Janeiro Rio de Janeiro, Brazil (Department's home page) Research interests Logic and Artificial Intelligence: Nonmonotonic Reasoning, Logic Programming, Logic for Multiple Agents (Modal, Defeasible, Relevant Logics). Machine Learning. Hybrid Systems: Connectionist Inductive Logic Programming System (a Knowledge Based Neural Network that is also a Logic Programming System). Knowledge Discovery on Databases (KDD) / Data Mining. Publications Some recent papers Research Projects C-IL2P: Connectionist Inductive Learning and Logic Programming System. Brazilian Research Council (CNPq). Computational Intelligence (ICOM): Principles and Applications (ProTeM-CC/CNPq) Courses Logic (medias finais 1/2001- revisao de prova 3/7 de 9-11 minha sala COPPE H 318B) Introduction to Artificial Intelligence Machine Learning Inductive Logic Programming Nonmonotonic Reasoning Students Fernanda Baiao Rodrigo Basilio Nelson Hallack Kate Cerqueira Revoredo Marcelo Andrade Teixeira Prof. Gerson Zaverucha Programa de Sistemas, COPPE/UFRJ Caixa Postal 68511 21945-970 Rio de Janeiro - RJ Brazil gerson@cos.ufrj.br http://www.cos.ufrj.br/~gerson +55-21-590-2552, ext. 241 (voice), ext. 5 (fax) +55-21-290-6626 (fax) Updated september 25, 1998
